philosophy.title: Coaching Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: My approach to football development
philosophy.coreText: My football coaching philosophy is based in developing players to perform within a clear and common idea, collective identity based on modern football principles. I believe the game should be played with intelligence, intensity, and intention.
philosophy.approachText: I lead training sessions with clarity, energy and a clear sense of direction, ensuring every player understands their role while feeling motivated to improve.
philosophy.rolesText: I have taken on multiple roles in football, including Head Coach, Assistant Coach, Scouter, Analyst, and Football Advisor, each contributing to my well-rounded understanding of the game.
